mapper.select: select cnum, wnum, writer, content, to_char(cdate,'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss') as cdate from mm_comments where wnum = #{wnum} order by cnum desc
mapper.insert: insert into mm_comments(cnum, wnum, writer, content) values(seq_mm_comments.nextval, #{wnum}, #{writer}, #{content})
mapper.update: update mm_comments set content = #{content}, cdate = sysdate where cnum = #{cnum}
